SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Create Summaries from Survey Responses

Generate summaries of survey responses using generative AI to gather feedback and valuable insights. Use data maps to automatically create or update records, or send custom notifications whenever a summary is generated.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses

To use generative AI to create survey response summaries, first turn on Einstein Generative AI.

Enable AI-Generated Surveys

Allow your users to create survey response summaries automatically using Generative AI.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To enable AI-Generated Surveys:	

System Administrator profile

AND

Assign User Permissions



From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Survey, and then select Survey Settings.
Turn on AI-Generated Surveys.
Define Configurations for Survey Response Summaries

Select the settings to activate the preferences for creating survey response summaries with Generative AI.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To define configurations for survey response summaries:	

Scoring Framework Admin

AND

Manage Natural Language Process Results



From Setup, in the Quick Find box, search for and select Industries AI Setup.
Click New Use Case Configuration.
Select Survey Response Summaries as the Configuration Type.
Enter a configuration label and a description.
Save the configuration.
Click Set Up and accept the terms of use.
From the dropdown, select Agree.
Save and activate the configuration.
Create Survey Response Summaries with Generative AI

Create summaries of survey responses to gather valuable insights from your target audience.

In the Survey Builder, click Advanced Settings, and then select Survey Data Mapping.
Click Create Response Summary.
Select the questions for which you want to create response summaries. You can select up to 10 questions.

The question types that response summaries support are Long Text, Short Text, Net Promoter Score (NPS), Rating, Multiple Selection, Single Selection, and Picklist.

Select whether you want to create a long summary and a short summary.

A long summary extends up to 4,000 characters, whereas a short summary is limited to 255 characters.

Select the condition type.
Every time	Creates a summary every time a response occurs.
Based on conditions	Defines rules about when to create a summary.
If you selected Based on conditions as the condition type, define the conditions.
Select one of the values from the picklist.
OPTION	WHEN IT APPLIES
All conditions are met	

All the conditions must be met


Any condition is met	

Any one condition must be met

Select a logic type.
OPTION	WHAT IT DEFINES
Response to Question	

The condition based on responses to questions in the survey


Response Field	The condition based on the value of the response field
Invitation Field	The condition based on the value of the invitation field
Associated Record	

The condition based on the value of the related object merge field


Participant Record	

The condition based on the value of the participant object merge field


Custom Variable	

The condition based on the value of the custom variable merge field


Org Variable	

The condition based on the value of the org variable merge field

Select a question, response field, invitation field, field, or variable based on the logic type that you selected.
Select an operator.
Select a response or enter a value that validates the condition. The values of merge fields appear as API names. For example, the value of an owner name field appears as OwnerId.
To define more conditions, click Add Condition.
Save the mapping and the survey.

You can create a data map and use response summaries to define the fields and values of the target object.

SEE ALSO

Salesforce Help: Enable Einstein Generative AI

title: Enabling Salesforce Feedback Management with Generative AI
